plot outline: Sandarbha is a 1978 Indian Kannada film, directed by "Gowrisundar" and Produced by "Gowrisundar".The film Stars "Bharathi, Vani, Reeta Anchan, Meenakshi, Roopashree, Kalpana, Ananthnag", in lead roles. The film had musical score by "S P Balasubramanyam". Watch the full Movie, Sandarbha , online, only On Eros Now.
